name: CheekyChorechart
0:
”Alexa, open cheeky chores”
”Alexa, ask cheeky chores to read my chore list”
”Alexa, ask cheeky chores to log a chore”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cheeky chores
des:
Use this spicy skill to keep track of everyone's chores but with a dash of -flair-. You can ask Alexa to read the list of chores that are assigned to you each day, and you can log your chores as you complete them. Alexa won't let you forget, I promise you'll see what I mean. You can even keep score and compete with other household members to see who finishes first...Or who owes who dinner. The chore tracker automatically resets on Sunday each week to reset the quirky competition. May the laziest lose (while everyone else home watches.)
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
